content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in renting my apartment. I must say, the apartment is in perfect condition, newly built, and in the heart of the city center. Now, about the rental price, I'm sure we can find a price that suits both of us. Let's start with 1000 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good starting point, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your offer. Could we perhaps negotiate a lower price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly, Yi-Nuo, let's negotiate. How about 900 euros per month? I'm sure you'll find the location of the apartment quite convenient, being close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The location is indeed very attractive, Mister Schmidt. However, I'm looking to keep my expenses as low as possible. Would you consider 800 euros per month? I'm sure we can reach an agreement that is fair for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm open to negotiations, Yi-Nuo. However, 800 euros per month is quite low for such a perfect apartment in the city center. How about 850 euros per month, and you can have a free parking space that I usually charge extra for?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The parking space is a nice addition, Mister Schmidt. I'll consider your offer. Would you be willing to go a bit lower, say 830 euros per month, considering the parking space is included?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm trying to be reasonable here, Yi-Nuo. 830 euros per month is too low, especially considering the added value of the parking space. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about 840 euros per month, and you get the parking space for free?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The parking space is a valuable asset, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 840 euros per month with the parking space included is an attractive offer. I'll think about it and get back to you. Would you be willing to wait a few minutes while I consider your offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Of course, Yi-Nuo, take your time. I'm in no hurry. Let me know when you've made your decision.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your patience, Mister Schmidt. After careful consideration, I believe your offer of 840 euros per month with the parking space included is fair. I agree to the price of 840 euros!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [840] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful! We have agreed on a price. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
